channel.title: PowerBI on Dataware Logistics
channel.description: Recent content in PowerBI on Dataware Logistics

item.title: How To Analyze PostgreSQL Data in Power BI.
item.description: Hello all! Today I want to discuss one of the dataviz tools that is getting more and more adoption; Power BI. Power BI increases its adoption among the most experienced users each day. Thanks to being a user-friendly tool with various data sources to connect to, it helps analyze distinct data sources within the same console. In this post, I’ll show you how to import your data stored on PostgreSQL with a desktop version of Power BI.
